titleStmt.title: The female advocate; or, A plea for the just liberty of the tender sex, and particularly of married women. Being reflections on a late rude and disingenuous discourse, delivered by Mr. John Sprint, in a sermon at a wedding, May 11th, at Sherburn in Dorsetshire, 1699. / By a Lady of Quality.
titleStmt.author: Chudleigh, Mary Lee, Lady, 1656-1710.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Andrew Bell at the Cross-Keys and Bible in Cornhil, near Stockmarket.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and the Christ Church Library, Oxford.
